item.title: Data Sharing in Modern Australia
item.description:
Description

Australia is reshaping data privacy and security aggressively on multiple fronts.How can you manage data security and privacy in your projects while the sands shift around you?

https://2019.pycon-au.org/talks/data-sharing-in-modern-australia

Fri Aug 2 11:10:00 2019 at Cockle Bay
item.dc:creator: Justin Warren

item.title: Predicting the TripleJ Hottest 100 With Python
item.description:
Description

Justin Warren https://2016.pycon-au.org/schedule/41/view_talk For several years now, I've used Python to help me attempt to predict the results of TripleJ's Hottest 100.

LEARN! how to write scripts that use more than CPU0 on your fancy multi-core laptop!

SEE! the alarming amount of information you can get through social network APIs.

MARVEL! at the myriad ways Optical Character Recognition will mangle your text!
item.dc:creator: Justin Warren
